actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to amend title 31 of the United States Code to require that the President's budget include a statement setting forth the percentage of total budget outlays contained in each major functional category.

summary.text: Requires the President to include in the annual budget transmitted to the Congress (beginning with the budget for FY 1988) a statement setting forth: (1) the percentage of total budget outlays contained in each major functional category and each subfunction; and (2) the percentage of total budget outlays for a major functional category contained in each subfunction thereof.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 31 of the United States Code to require that the President's budget include a statement setting forth the percentage of total budget outlays contained in each major functional category.
